document_data.name: Gwendolynn
document_data.titles: Druid of Dynloch Pass{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3117}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Gwendolynn''' was the [[Druid|druid]] of [[Dynloch Pass]], high in the [[Synnoria|Synnorian Mountains]].

History.Death: Gwendolynn was killed by [[Trahern|Trahern of Oakvale]] so he could open the Pass to [[Grunnarch|Grunnarch the Red]] and his army.
